title: Michelle and Barack Obama pen sweet letters to each other on their 27th anniversary
text:
Michelle and Barack Obama pen sweet letters to each other on their 27th anniversary share this

Former US President and First lady, Barack and Michelle Obama are celebrating their 27th wedding anniversary and the pair seems to still be smitten with each other.

Taking to their social media pages, they penned sweet tributes to each other to celebrate their love.

Read more: Barack Obama to Michelle: ‘You’re one of a kind’

“27 years ago, this guy promised me a life full of adventure. I’d say he’s delivered. Here’s to our next chapter of becoming empty nesters and discovering what’s next—while still feeling the magic that brought us together all those years ago. Happy anniversary, Barack,” Michelle wrote for her man.

While Barack posted a picture of the two cradling each other as they stare into the wild and thanked his wife for the years in the caption.

“Like the Beatles said: It’s getting better all the time. Thanks, babe, for 27 amazing years!,” he wrote.

Read more: Marriage tips from Michelle Obama: "Marry your equal!"

Earlier this year, the former first lady shared her marriage tips where she advised people to marry their equal – and well, it’s safe to say she knew what she was speaking about after 27 years of being in a successful marriage.
description: Former US President and First lady, Barack and Michelle Obama are celebrating their 27th wedding anniversary.
